name: 鸟儿的童年汉字早教- 教育学前班孩子的认字游戏
name_original: 鸟儿的童年汉字早教- 教育学前班孩子的认字游戏
description:
This is a part of a series of Chinese studying tools aimed at learning the words for birds, we have not specifically translated the words into other languages, just wish you learn Chinese in the real Chinese environment , to learn any language , the most important is to look himself as a child,As we know, the child is a genius while learning language.

If you wish your children to learn Chinese, this software is also an excellent choice,for it is used teach the kids in China too, wish you and your family successful in learning Chinese.
